T02D3055:108a-1: ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D3055:108a-3: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3055:108a-5: sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas sna tshogs padma dang nyi
T02D3055:108a-6: ma la ye shes ham yig dmar po las skyes
T02D3055:108a-7: pa'i 'phags pa rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal
T02D3055:108a-10: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni sngon po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3055:108a-11: sdrul gyis brgyan cing 'gying bas bzhugs pa /
T02D3055:108a-12: zhal dang po khro bo'i mig gis blta ba /
T02D3055:108a-13: g-yas kyi zhal ni ljags 'dril ba /
T02D3055:108a-14: g-yon gyi zhal ni tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D3055:108a-15: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can no //
T02D3055:108a-16: g-yas kyi phyag bzhin rdo rje dang /
T02D3055:108a-19: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi yis sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D3055:108a-20: rang gi nu ma la reg pa dang /
T02D3055:108a-22: cod pan la mi bskyod pa bsam mo //
T02D3055:108a-23: 'di ni rta mchog ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D3055:108a-24: aom ham hya gr'i ba sv'a h'a /
T02D3055:108a-25: zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02D3055:108a-26: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3055:108a-28: // / rgya gar yul b'a r'a na s'i'i pandi ta pu ru shotta ma'i zhal snga nas mnyan te /
T02D3055:108a-29: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan
T02D3055:108a-30: dpal bzang pos bla ma dam pa'i bkas gtsug lag
